snippet: During his first meeting with the recently elected Nerendra Modi , the secretary of state tried to improve relations and close a divide over a trade treaty.
abstract: Secretary of State John Kerry, during his first meeting with Indian Prime Minister Nerendra Modi, tries to improve relations and close a divide over an international trade treaty.

byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and GARDINER HARRIS

lead_paragraph: During his first meeting with the recently elected Nerendra Modi , the secretary of state tried to improve relations and close a divide over a trade treaty.

headline.main: In India, Kerry Seeks Compromise With Prime Minister
headline.print_headline: In India, Kerry Seeks CompromiseWith Prime Minister
